com.cigital.insecurepay.fragments

Class ChatFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cigital.insecurepay.fragments.ChatFragment

  • public class ChatFragment
extends java.lang.Object
    ChatFragment extends Fragment. This class is used to handles file upload and sending customer feedback operations.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  ChatFragment.UploadFileTask
      UploadFileTask extends AsyncCommonTask to asynchronously communicate with the server and upload file.
      (package private) class  ChatFragment.WebAppInterface
      WebInterface is class allows webPage to call showDialog().

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INPUT_FILE_REQUEST_CODE

      ChatFragment is the default constructor of this class

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void getFileName(Uri fileUri)
      getFileName is a function that gets the name of the file to upload.
      void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data)
      onActivityResult is an overridden function that is called when the user is done with selecting file and returns.
      View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) 
      void run(java.lang.String responseFeedback)
      run is a function that starts a new thread to render feedback message on the webView.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreateView

        public View onCreateView(LayoutInflater inflater,
                         ViewGroup container,
                         Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • getFileName

        public void getFileName(Uri fileUri)
        getFileName is a function that gets the name of the file to upload.
        Parameters:
        fileUri - The fileUri object

      • onActivityResult

        public void onActivityResult(int requestCode,
                             int resultCode,
                             Intent data)
        onActivityResult is an overridden function that is called when the user is done with selecting file and returns.
        Parameters:
        requestCode - The request code you passed to startActivityForResult().
        resultCode - A result code specified by the second activity
        data - An Intent that carries the result data.

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String responseFeedback)
        run is a function that starts a new thread to render feedback message on the webView. It is called from postSuccess in ChatSubjectTask.
        Parameters:
        responseFeedback - The subject to be displayed.
